metadata.title: CVE-2019-10904 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Roundup 1.6 allows XSS via the URI because frontends/roundup.cgi androundup/cgi/wsgi_handler.py mishandle 404 errors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10904` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundup - 1.4.20-1.1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundup package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.20-1.1+deb8u2build0.16.04.1').
